page.title: 06MY HOUSE
page.content: I live in a semi-detached house on Fairless Avenue, Lightcliffe. There are 6 rooms: a bathroom, a front room, a dining room, 2 bedrooms and a kitchen. There are 4 people in my family, so we have enough room in our semi-detached house. We have carpets in each room, with curtains, pictures and furniture. My bedroom is painted red and white. When we moved into our house it didn't have a drive, now it does. We have also put ranch fencing around the garden. We have a shed. lawns and stone flower boxes in the garden. We have various different types of electrical equipment in the house. In the front room is a T.V. a video, organ and stereo. My bedroom has a T.V. a computer, cassette player and a stereo. In the kitchen we have a washing machine, kettle, drier, food mixer, clock, cooker and fridge.
